project.description: Launch a CloVR Microbe pipeline with 454 assembly only using local credentials

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash set -e source /opt/vappio-scripts/clovrEnv.sh
DATE=`date +"%m-%d-%Y-%T" | sed -e 's/:/_/g'`
vp-add-dataset --tag-name=hudson_sff_test_local /opt/hudson/BD413_wt_contig170.sff -o
vp-describe-protocols --config-from-protocol=clovr_assembly_celera \ -c input.INPUT_SFF_TAG=hudson_sff_test_local \ -c params.OUTPUT_PREFIX=BD413_mini \ -c params.SKIP_BANK=true \ -c microbe_track='assembly' \ -c cluster.CLUSTER_NAME='local' \ -c cluster.CLUSTER_CREDENTIAL='local' \ -c cluster.TERMINATE_ONFINISH=false \ -c pipeline.PIPELINE_DESC="Hudson CloVR Microbe 454 Assembly Test local" \ > /tmp/$$.pipeline.conf.${DATE}
TASK_NAME=`vp-run-pipeline --print-task-name --pipeline-config /tmp/$$.pipeline.conf.${DATE} --overwrite`
if [ "$?" == "1" ]; then echo "vp-run-pipeline failed to run" exit 1 fi
vp-describe-task --name local --exit-code --block $TASK_NAME
exit $?
